Message: customer said this morning i spent about ten minutes upset because my toothbrush died and i wasnt able to brush my teeth. agent said and on top of that the escalator was out of order adam it never rains but it pours luckily youve come to the right team and wed be more than happy to assist you could you elaborate on the issue can we still help awaiting your reply. agent said hello adam we hope all is well we were wondering if we could still be of assistance to you if so please feel free to reach out to us at any time hope to hear from you soon. customer said it turned out that it was just out of battery which seems to happen way more often now i big brained it and just used it as a regular toothbrush instead. agent said were proud of you adam
Summary: adam tells the team that his toothbrush died and he used it as a regular toothbrush to brush his teeth because it was out of battery. The team is willing to help him with any problem with it. They hope to hear from him soon and are proud of him.

Message: customer said the options green tubes you dont need to use the other pieces just so you know they deff are the slowest rates ive tried a million bottles. customer said nikki dagostino yes i hated the feeling of the bottle so awkward and he was choking on the slowest flow i have both options and the regular i throw the regular in the dishwasher so i dont mind them. customer said nikki dagostino youre welcome good luck girl
Summary: Nikki dagostino hates the feeling of the bottle but doesn't mind the slowest rate of the regular option and throws the regular in the dishwasher instead of using the green tubes because they are faster than the regular ones, but thinks the regular one is better.

Message: customer asked is anyone available to chat. agent asked hello ashlie thanks for getting in touch and sorry four our late reply how can we help you. customer said sorry i mustve hit something by accident im all good here thanks. customer asked is anyone available to chat. customer asked is anyone available to chat. agent said thanks for coming back to us ashlie no worries feel free to get in touch if you need our assistance
Summary: Ashlie asks whether can chat. says can get in touch if she needs their assistance. They express their gratitude and regards each other for getting in touch. They are available to chat at any time they need it. They greet each other on the phone or text each other.

Message: customer said the worst shaving device ever mine went into the trash. agent said hello thanks for contacting our team and we regret for your shaver feel free to share what happens to your device and let us know if we can still be of any help you can also send us a private message thanks. customer said worst shaver ever i recently tossed mine in the trash. agent said hello we just wanted to check if you still needed any help feel free to reply as we are more than happy to assist you further. customer said terrible rash producing product. agent said we are sorry to heart about this again let us know if there is anything we can help with thanks
Summary: tells that the worst shaving device ever went into the trash. apologizes and will help with any further services that needs further help with the problem of the terrible rash producing product. is willing to offer any help at any time that can still be of any help to them.

Message: customer asked a woman who is a month or two pregt can use it during this period. customer said dilanne ranne ychabah l hada li kotlak alih mais hada bazaf ghali. customer said dilanne ranne lemodele no moins cher w est ce qu il parat takhdam bienwalah hart. agent said hello rn thanks for contacting us and for asking please never use the device if you are pregt or breastfeeding as the device was not tested on pregt or breastfeeding women we hope this helps
Summary: asks a woman who is a month or two pregt can use the device during the period. says the device was not tested on pregt or breastfeeding women and never uses it if they are pregents or breastfeeding, then they express their gratitude to each other for contacting them.

Message: customer said hello recently my philips stopped charging on its base i have cleaned it profusely with a cotton swab and still it wont charge. agent said hello evan thanks for coming back to us and thats a pity your device stopped charging lets see how we can help you with this problem could you send us a photo of the product details located on the bottom of your toothbrush we will wait for your answer thank you. agent said hi there evan hope youre doing well we just wanted to see if you still needed our help feel free to contact us again if you do well be happy to help
Summary: assists with the stopped charging of Evans's electronic device. asks him to send a photo of the product details to contact them again if he still needs their help to see how to deal with the problem. is happy to be happy to help him with this problem at any time.

Message: customer said hey there your page is amazing and the philips sonicare brand is obviously iconic id definitely love to work together im open to various opportunities with your brand who should i reach out to for partnerships lets chat best carlis. agent said hello carlis thanks for reaching out to us and for your interest we are currently only collaborating through our philips product tester platform if you are interested in becoming a philips product tester we hope this helps and we wish you success in your career
Summary: assists in making a business deal with Philips sonicare and offers to be a product tester and wishes him success in his career. agrees and says they are currently only collaborating through their product testers platform and hopes to see the benefits. s current working experience and hopes this helps.

Message: customer said hi i still havent heard back from your other team. agent said hi nateshwari thanks for reaching out we are sorry to hear our colleagues havent contacted you back we have sent them a reminder to solicit a response from them it may be busier than usual due to the holiday season but rest assured theyll get back to you please feel free to let us know if you still should not receive a response in a few days thank you for your patience. customer said okay thanks. agent said youre welcome nateshwari feel free to let us know in case our further assistance is needed
Summary: Nateshwari hasn't received any response from other team. asks her to contact them if the response is not received by the end of the day or in case of further assistance is needed. is grateful for their patience and regards them as the holiday season.

Message: customer said where can i find the natural nipples seems all or most sizes are out of stock everywhere i look. agent said hi julia thank you for reaching out were sorry to hear that the low stock is making it difficult for you to find the nipples you need wed be happy to look into this for you feel free to share your country of residence so we can do that. agent said hello julia just checking in are we able to provide you with any further assistance feel free to let us know
Summary: The low stock of the natural nipples is making it difficult for Julia to find the ones she needs. asks her to share her country of residence so they can help her find the one she needs at any time. is willing to offer any further assistance at any price that she can find.

Message: customer said a representative at told me you are discontinuing this product when i tried to buy replacement heads. agent said hello thanks for your interest in our trimmers the one blade line is not being discontinued which specific model are you referring to can you please also confirm in which country you are located thanks. agent said hello just checking in are we able to provide you with any further assistance feel free to let us know
Summary: assists in discontinuing the trimmers and asks to confirm the specific model and the country. is assisting with any further assistance at the check-in with assistance at check in and confirm in the name of the trimmer's location for further assistance. says the one blade line will be discontinued.
